sentences.en: ‘It is a historic moment ,’ he told journalists.
sentences.cn: “那是历史性的一刻。”他告诉新闻记者。

sentences.en: a historic meeting of world leaders
sentences.cn: 具有历史意义的世界领导人会议

sentences.en: Blocks of flats have been holed and some shells have fallen within the historic ramparts.
sentences.cn: 几栋公寓楼被炸出了窟窿，几枚炮弹还落在了古护城墙内。

sentences.en: Both my travelling companion and I wanted to go to Waterloo — that historic battlefield.
sentences.cn: 我的旅游伙伴和我都想去滑铁卢——那个历史上著名的战场.

sentences.en: Britain was accused of trying to partition the country "because of historic enmity"
sentences.cn: 英国被指“出于历史仇恨”企图分裂该国。

sentences.en: China's takeover of Hong Kong was a historic event.
sentences.cn: 中国收回香港是一件具有历史意义的大事。

sentences.en: He described Britain's entry into the European Exchange Rate Mechanism as an historic move.
sentences.cn: 他将英国加入欧洲汇率机制描述为具有历史意义的一步。

sentences.en: It’s unlikely that the share price will exceed historic levels.
sentences.cn: 股价不太可能超过历史水平。

sentences.en: Its historic buildings are being slowly and splendidly renovated.
sentences.cn: 此处的历史建筑正被缓慢且精心地修复着。

sentences.en: Much of historic Rennes was destroyed by fire in 1720.
sentences.cn: 雷恩古城的大部分在1720年的大火中毁于一旦。

sentences.en: Penn Central involved a New York historic preservation ordinance.
sentences.cn: 宾州的运输受到了纽约州一项历史文物保护法规的牵连.

sentences.en: The area is of special historic interest.
sentences.cn: 这个地区有特别历史意义。

sentences.en: The groups had historic scores to settle with each other.
sentences.cn: 这两个集团之间有几笔旧账要了结。

sentences.en: The historic feeling of the town makes it a pleasant place to base oneself for summer vacations.
sentences.cn: 该镇的历史气息让它成为人们夏季度假的好去处。

sentences.en: The historic mansion was presented by the owner to the city, and is now kept up by the local authority.
sentences.cn: 这幢有历史意义的宅邸是房主送给城市的, 现在由地方当局保养维修.

sentences.en: The invaders gutted the historic building.
sentences.cn: 侵略者们将那幢历史上有名的建筑洗劫一空.

sentences.en: They were lured by a curiosity to see the historic spot.
sentences.cn: 他们被好奇心驱使去看古迹.
这是具有重大历史意义的时刻.

words.tran_cn: 历史的；史学的；基于史实的
历史上地；从历史观点上说
历史，历史学；历史记录；来历

phrases.tran_cn: 古迹；历史遗迹；历史地段

trans.tran_cn: 历史（性）的，有历史记载的
trans.tran_en: a historic event or act is very important and will be recorded as part of history
